li.text: Assign only qualified workers to operate the forklift. Before the machine body can be lift by forklift, it must be confirmed that all the forklift capacity are strong enough for the weight and that the machine body center gravity must be within the fork. If a heavy load falls due to loss balance during operation, the load may be damaged and workers may be seriously injured.
